creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: two separate sheets; ink drawing on thin paper; scene on a bridge with foreshortened figure at right, jumping in a tight ball in the air, with PR hand outstretched above head; crouching man with wide stance at left, wearing armor, and holding a staff at the diagonal, head tilted toward PL; detail of railing at URC of left sheet
dimension: 15 3/16 × 10 5/8 in. (38.58 × 26.99 cm) (sheet, each, approx., two vertical ōban)
medium: Preparatory drawing for a print; ink on paper
title: Preparatory drawing for the left and right sheets of Picture of the Gojō Bridge from the Chronicle of Yoshitsune
